Title: Mizuiro no One-Piece
Description: ['Music video for the single ', Mizuiro no One-Piece, " by Japanese singer-songwriter Yasuha that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video features a blend of live-action scenery and animation by Kouji Nanke."]
Related: ['Alternative setting: Kakyuusei 2: Hitomi no Naka no Shoujo-tachi']
